version_description:
Important notice - Say hello to Layer!

Wait... What...?
We gave uniq a fresh look and a brand new name. Introducing Layer.
- Animated Stickers
- 120+ Templates
- 20+ Animations
- 20+ World-Class Filters
- Sleek New Look

We hope you will like this major update. We're keen to know what you think, please send us your feedback to hello@layerapp.io
If you like this update, please consider rating us 5 stars.

With Love,
The Layer team

If you love Layer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @get_layer.

We got you a SWEET update with full compatibility for iOS13.
Now you can use Layer with Dark Mode with a smooth dimmed experience.

We also got you covered with a new Art collection to maximize your artistic side.

Oh, and bug fixes as usual :)

If you like Layer, please consider rating us 5 stars, thank you.

With Love,
The Layer family

We have a NEW thing to tell you - Motion!
With Motion, you can animate your videos and photos within the template to make your stories even more attractive!

We added lots of Christmas templates for the Holiday Season. Don't miss it!

Also, we fixed lots of bugs for a smoother experience!

If you like Layer, please consider rating us 5 stars, thank you :)

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
The Layer team

Are you ready? We integrated UNSPLASH!
Fill your stories with professional photography, millions of photos for every occasion!
We upgraded our photo picker so now you can choose the same photo multiple times.

Also, we fixed lots of bugs for a smoother experience!

If you like Layer, please consider rating us 5 stars, thank you :)
With Love,
The Layer team

New STICKERS in town!
We got you covered with millions of stickers by GIPHY.
From now, you can choose unlimited animated stickers, emojis, text and other GIFs in seconds.
Also, we fixed lots of bugs for a smoother experience!

In light of the recent outbreak of coronavirus (COVID-19) around the world, we hope that you, your family, your colleagues at work and friends are safe and taking appropriate precautions.

With Love,
The Layer team

HUGE UPDATE!
Are you ready? We added tons of new features!
We added new textures and gradients. Added placeholder swap and new effects and filters.
Seriously, our best update since launch. Check it out - NOW!

In light of the recent outbreak of coronavirus (COVID-19) around the world, we hope that you, your family, your colleagues at work and friends are safe and taking appropriate precautions.

With Love,
The Layer team
